# FAO Database Schema

# Generated from 84 tables

# Format: column_name: type (nullable?) [FK->table] [idx]

#============================================================


## LOOKUP TABLES


area_codes
----------
  id: Integer (PK)
  area_code: String [uniq]
  area: String
  area_code_m49: String (null)
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

currencies
----------
  id: Integer (PK)
  iso_currency_code: String [uniq]
  currency: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

donors
------
  id: Integer (PK)
  donor_code: String [uniq]
  donor: String
  donor_code_m49: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

elements
--------
  id: Integer (PK)
  element_code: String [uniq]
  element: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

flags
-----
  id: Integer (PK)
  flag: String(1) [idx] [uniq]
  description: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

food_groups
-----------
  id: Integer (PK)
  food_group_code: String [uniq]
  food_group: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

geographic_levels
-----------------
  id: Integer (PK)
  geographic_level_code: String [uniq]
  geographic_level: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

indicators
----------
  id: Integer (PK)
  indicator_code: String [uniq]
  indicator: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

item_codes
----------
  id: Integer (PK)
  item_code: String [uniq]
  item: String
  item_code_cpc: String (null)
  item_code_fbs: String (null)
  item_code_sdg: String (null)
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

population_age_groups
---------------------
  id: Integer (PK)
  population_age_group_code: String [uniq]
  population_age_group: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

purposes
--------
  id: Integer (PK)
  purpose_code: String [uniq]
  purpose: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

releases
--------
  id: Integer (PK)
  release_code: String [uniq]
  release: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

sexs
----
  id: Integer (PK)
  sex_code: String [uniq]
  sex: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

sources
-------
  id: Integer (PK)
  source_code: String [uniq]
  source: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

surveys
-------
  id: Integer (PK)
  survey_code: String [uniq]
  survey: String
  source_dataset: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

## DATASET TABLES


aquastat
--------
  id: Integer (PK)
  area_code_id: Integer [FK->area_codes]
  element_code_id: Integer [FK->elements]
  flag_id: Integer [FK->flags]
  unit: String(50) (null)
  year: SmallInteger [idx]
  year_code: String(4)
  value: Float
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

-----------------
  id: Integer (PK)
  area_code_id: Integer [FK->area_codes]
  item_code_id: Integer [FK->item_codes]
  element_code_id: Integer [FK->elements]
  flag_id: Integer [FK->flags]
  year_code: String(4)
  year: SmallInteger [idx]
  unit: String(50)
  value: Float
  note: String
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime

  element_code_id: Integer [FK->elements]
  flag_id: Integer [FK->flags]
  year_code: String(4)
  year: SmallInteger [idx]
  unit: String(50)
  value: Float
  created_at: DateTime
  updated_at: DateTime
